name: search_flight_location
description: Find airports by their location, address, state, country, etc.

query.description: Names of airport, locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.
query.title: Query

languagecode.description: To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages ) endpoint in Meta collection.
languagecode.title: Languagecode

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.
fromId.title: Fromid

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.
toId.title: Toid

departDate.description: Departure or travel date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD
departDate.title: Departdate

stops.description: Filters flights based on the number of stops. Accepted values are: none for no preference (returns flights with any number of stops) 0 for non-stop flights 1 for one-stop flights 2 for two-stop flights If provided, the value must be either none, 0, 1, or 2.
stops.title: Stops

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1. Default: 1
adults.title: Adults

children.description: The number of children, including infants, who are under 18. Example: Child 1 Age = 8 months Child 2 Age = 1 year Child 3 Age = 17 years Here is what the request parameter would look like: children_age: 0,1,17
children.title: Children

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.
sort.title: Sort

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.
cabinClass.title: Cabinclass

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.
currency_code.title: Currency Code

legs.description: The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array. EXAMPLE: [ { 'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT', 'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT', 'date': '2024-05-25' },  ] Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.
legs.title: Legs

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1. Default: 1
adults.title: Adults

children.description: The number of children, including infants, who are under 18. Example: Child 1 Age = 8 months Child 2 Age = 1 year Child 3 Age = 17 years Here is what the request parameter would look like: children_age: 0,1,17
children.title: Children

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.
sort.title: Sort

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.
cabinClass.title: Cabinclass

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.
currency_code.title: Currency Code

token.description: token can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchFlights(Search Flights) or api/v1/flights/searchFlightsMultiStops(Search Flights Multi Stops) endpoints in Flights collection as token.
token.title: Token

currency_code.title: Currency Code

toId.title: Toid

departDate.title: Departdate

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.
cabinClass.title: Cabinclass

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.
currency_code.title: Currency Code

legs.description: The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array. EXAMPLE: [ { 'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT', 'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT', 'date': '2024-05-25' },  ] Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

currency_code.title: Currency Code

offerToken.title: Offertoken

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

name: search_car_location
description: Find locations by searching for their name, address, city, state, country, etc.

query.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.
query.title: Query

languagecode.description: To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages ) endpoint in Meta collection.
languagecode.title: Languagecode

pick_up_latitude.description: The pick up location's latitude. pick_up_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object. Default: 40.6397018432617
pick_up_latitude.title: Pick Up Latitude

pick_up_longitude.description: The pick up location's longitude. pick_up_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object. Default: -73.7791976928711
pick_up_longitude.title: Pick Up Longitude

drop_off_latitude.description: The drop off location's latitude. drop_off_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object. Default: 40.6397018432617
drop_off_latitude.title: Drop Off Latitude

drop_off_longitude.description: The drop off location's longitude. drop_off_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object. Default: -73.7791976928711
drop_off_longitude.title: Drop Off Longitude

pick_up_time.description: Pick up time Format: HH:MM Note: The format of time is 24 hours.
pick_up_time.title: Pick Up Time

drop_off_time.description: Drop off time Format: HH:MM Note: The format of time is 24 hours.
drop_off_time.title: Drop Off Time

driver_age.description: The driver's age. The default value is set to 30. Note: The driver age must be in the range of 20 to 65 years. Default: 30
driver_age.title: Driver Age

filters.description: Used to refine search results based on specific suppliers, car categories, or other attributes. Multiple filters can be applied by passing them as a comma-separated list in the following format: :: For example: supplier::Avis,supplier::Budget,carCategory::medium,carCategory::large This will return results from Avis and Budget, and only cars in the medium and large categories. To discover available filters, make a request to the /api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals endpoint and refer to the data  filter section in the response.
filters.title: Filters

languagecode.description: To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages ) endpoint in Meta collection.
languagecode.title: Languagecode

currency_code.title: Currency Code

typeFilters.description: typeFilters can be retrieved from /api/v1/attraction/searchAttractions(Search Attractions) endpoint in Hotels collection. data->filterOptions-> typeFilters[]-> tagname. Note:- typeFilters should be separated by commas if passing multiple values. Example: tag1,tag2,tag
typeFilters.title: Typefilters

priceFilters.description: priceFilters can be retrieved from /api/v1/attraction/searchAttractions(Search Attractions) endpoint in Hotels collection. data->filterOptions-> priceFilters[]-> tagname. Note:- priceFilters should be separated by commas if passing multiple values. Example: tag1,tag2,tag
priceFilters.title: Pricefilters

ufiFilters.description: ufiFilters can be retrieved from /api/v1/attraction/searchAttractions(Search Attractions) endpoint in Hotels collection. data->filterOptions-> ufiFilters[]-> tagname. Note:- ufiFilters should be separated by commas if passing multiple values. Example: tag1,tag2,tag
ufiFilters.title: Ufifilters

labelFilters.description: labelFilters can be retrieved from /api/v1/attraction/searchAttractions(Search Attractions) endpoint in Hotels collection. data->filterOptions-> labelFilters[]-> tagname. Note:- labelFilters should be separated by commas if passing multiple values. Example: tag1,tag2,tag
labelFilters.title: Labelfilters

name: get_attraction_reviews
description: Retrieves reviews for a specified attraction, including user ratings, comments, and review counts.
